com.axelor.studio.service

Class ModelRecorderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.ModuleRecorderService
      • com.axelor.studio.service.ModelRecorderService

  • public class ModelRecorderService
extends ModuleRecorderService
    Service class generate domain xml files from MetaModels. It process MetaModel to create model and MetaField to create field xml.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Method Detail

      • record

        public boolean record()
        Root method to accesss the service. It will find all edited and customised MetaModels. Call other methods to process MetaModel founds.
        Overrides:
        record in class ModuleRecorderService
        Returns:

      • updateEdited

        public void updateEdited(java.util.List<MetaModel> models)
        Method to reset edited boolean to false when processing of model completed.
        Parameters:
        models - List of MetaModel to process.

      • recordModel

        private void recordModel(java.util.Iterator<MetaModel> modelIterator)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Method create domain xml file from MetaModel. It create one single domain xml string for domain and write it to file. Also call method to process fields.
        Parameters:
        modelIterator - MetaModel iterator
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown by file handling of domain xml file.

      • writeFields

        private void writeFields(java.util.Iterator<MetaField> fieldIterator)
        This method process MetaField and create field xml from it. The generated field xml will be appended to model xml.
        Parameters:
        fieldIterator - MetaField iterator

      • writeMinMax

        private void writeMinMax(MetaField field)
        Special method to append min/max attributes to field xml for string and integer type of fields.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeInteger

        private void writeInteger(MetaField field)
        Method to set default value and min/max for integer type of field.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeDecimal

        private void writeDecimal(MetaField field)
        Method to process decimal type of field for default,min,max attributes and append it to field xml.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeString

        private void writeString(MetaField field)
        Method to process string type of field for default,large,min,max attributes and append it to field xml.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeBoolean

        private void writeBoolean(MetaField field)
        Method to process boolean field for default attributes and append it to field xml.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeRelational

        private void writeRelational(MetaField field)
        Method to add 'ref' attribute in field xml for relational field. It search typeName of MetaField for reference model and set fullName as reference.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeSelection

        public void writeSelection(MetaField field)
        Method create selection xml from MetaSelect of MetaField. It append selection xml string to selectionBuilder.
        Parameters:
        field - MetaField to process

      • writeFile

        private void writeFile(java.io.File file,
             java.lang.String content)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method to write domain xml file.
        Parameters:
        file - File to write.
        content - Content to write in file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown by file handling.

      • writeSelectionXml

        private void writeSelectionXml(java.lang.String selectionXml)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Special method for writing separate file 'Selection.xml' for selections xml string generated during model recording.
        Parameters:
        selectionXml - Xml string containing selections.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception in file writing.

      • sortFieldEditorList

        public void sortFieldEditorList(java.util.List<MetaField> fieldList)
        Sort list of MetaFields according to sequence.
        Parameters:
        fieldList -

      • getCustomisedFields

        public java.util.List<MetaField> getCustomisedFields(java.util.List<MetaField> fields)
        Method filter customised field from list MetaField. Only customised field will be processed and added in domain xml file.
        Parameters:
        fields - List of MetaField to filter.
        Returns:
        List of customised field.

      • updateTranslation

        public void updateTranslation(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.String value,
                     java.lang.String language)
        Method create/update MetaTranslation for help text of a field.
        Parameters:
        key - Key for translation.
        value - Value for translation.
        language - Translation language to update.

      • getFieldTypeName

        public java.lang.String getFieldTypeName(MetaField metaField)
        Method convert simple type name of field into adk supported 'typeName' (which is type class name) for MetaField.
        Parameters:
        metaField - MetaField to get typeName.
        Returns:
        Adk supported typeName.
